FAQ: Entries for the banner's Frequently Asked Questions list and information modal
JPEG_thumbnails: meguca uses WebP thumbnails by default. Enable this, if you want to support older browsers, Safari or Apple devices at the expense of no thumbnail transparency.
always_lock_to_bottom: Lock scrolling to page bottom even when tab is hidden
audio_volume: Volume of audio in music and video players.
background_video: Admin-specified memes piped straight into you're monitor
captcha: Ask users to complete a captcha for certain tasks like registration and thread creation
captcha_tags: Tags to source for captcha solutions. One tag is randomly chosen for each generated captcha. Required to contain at least 3 different tags.
char_score: Antispam weight of modifying a character in a post. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
custom_CSS: User-defined CSS rules loaded on top of the selected theme
default_language: Language pack to load by default
default_theme: Theme to load by default, when none is set by the client
disable_robots: Prevent automated website crawlers, such as search engine indexers, from accessing this board.
eightball: List of answers for the #8ball hash command. Can contain up to 100 answers and 2000 characters total.
expand_all: Expand all images. Webm, PDF and MP3 and your own post aren't affected. New post images are also expanded.
feedback_email: User feedback email to display in the top banner
flags: Display poster country flags on posts
forced_anonymity: Disable user names, tripcodes and emails on posts
hide_binned: Hide all posts that have been deleted
hide_recursively: Hide all posts, that replied to a hidden post recursively
hide_thumbnails: Display a [Show] button in place of thumbnails
image_root_override: If you wish to host images from a separate location like a CDN, enter the full root address here. Leave empty to use the default address. Example: 'https://images.meguca.org'
image_score: Antispam weight of posting an image. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
inline_fit: Expand images inside the parent post and resize according to setting
janitors: Janitor account IDs. Janitors can only delete posts.
links: Add, remove or edit external >>>/4chan/-type references
mascot_image: Image to use as the mascot
mature: Inform the user the website contains mature content on first visit
max_size: Maximum size of uploaded images in MB
meguTV: Play random board-specific videos in overlay player
meguTV_shortcut: Play random board-specific videos in overlay player
moderators: Moderator account IDs. Moderators can delete posts, ban posters and distinguish posters by their mnemonic IDs.
name: Name
Name to attach to new posts
notice: Short informational message displayed at the top of the page
notification: Get desktop notifications when quoted or a syncwatch is about to start
now_playing: Currently playing song on r/a/dio or eden and other stream information in the top banner.
owners: Owner account IDs. Board owners have full access to all board controls. Must contain at least one.
post_creation_score: Antispam weight of creating a new post. After exceeding the limit the user will need to solve a captcha.
post_inline_expansion: Inline linked post under the post link on click. When disabled, navigates to the linked post instead.
prune_threads: Delete threads that have not had any posts in N days
relative_timestamps: Relative post timestamps. Ex.: '1 hour ago'
reply_right: Move Reply button to the right side of the page
root_URL: Root URL of the imageboard. Required for some image search providers to work.
sage: Do not bump the thread to the top of the board on post creation.
salt: Salt for secure tripcode and mnemonic generation. Recommended to be at least 40 characters long.
staff_title: Display your staff title in the post header
thread_expiry: Number of days without bumping posts before a thread is deleted
title: Board title
Short descriptive title of the board
toggle_spoiler: Toggle spoiler in the open post
user_background_image: Image to use as the background
watch_threads_on_reply: Automatically add thread to watched threads on reply
webm_hover_preview: Display WebM previews on hover. Requires Image Hover Expansion enabled.
work_mode: Hides images and disables user background
work_mode_shortcut: Hides images and disables user background

banPage: You have been banned from /%s/ by %s for the following reason:
Your ban will expire on %s or in %s.
According to our server, your IP is %s.

ui.bannerSpecs: Accepts up to 20 JPEG, PNG, GIF or WEBM files with maximum dimensions of 300x100, maximum file size of 100 KB and no sound.
ui.loadingSpecs: Accepts a GIF or WEBM file with maximum dimensions of 300x300, maximum file size of 100 KB and no sound.
ui.searchTooltip: Filter threads by subject, body or board name encased in backslashes. Accepts Regular expressions.
ui.subject: Subject
